description:
Pencilgon makes a proposal to the other clans. Sunraku forwards his interests in Rabituza, and faces a setback in his farming of the Crystal Scorpions.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito wa Fukanou o Yume ni Miru, Iza Sora o Aruku Toki
When Humanity Dreams of the Impossible and Takes to the Skies
人は不可能を夢に見る, いざ空を歩く時
